title: Cognito to API Gateway private REST API
description: This pattern shows how to authenticate and authorize requests to a private REST API Gateway with Amazon Cognito.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use Amazon Cognito with a private AWS REST API Gateway to authenticate and authorize requests to a private HTTP endpoint hosted on a Network Load Balancer and ECS/Fargate.
